title: Wet Wally
subtle: Humorous (fiction), 41 words, Level B (Grade K), Lexile 50L
description: Have you ever had one of those days? Poor Wally is having a tough time. It seems as if no matter what he does, something ends up getting wet! Don't worry though--Wally comes up with a fun way to end his rotten day! Wet Wally is a cute story with vibrant illustrations and repetitive text to support early, emergent readers. This book can also be used to identify simple cause-and-effect relationships and to identify nouns.
reviewWords: lunch, phone, shoes, swimming, tie, wet
comprehension: Cause and Effect                : Identify cause-and-effect relationships
awareness: Initial Consonants                : Discriminate initial consonant /w/ sound
wordWork: High-Frequency Words : Identify and use the high-frequency word his
